author: fern
description:
Start learning on Brilliant for free today: https://brilliant.org/fern. Our viewers get 20% off an annual premium subscription. It’s a great way to support our channel while building new skills (ad).

This is the story of the kid who hacked Elon Musk. 

Shoutout to the Cybercrime Magazine Podcast and their episode with Gregg Benett: https://soundcloud.com/cybercrimemagazine/losing-identity-and-bitcoin-getting-hacked-by-sim-swapping-gregg-bennett 

Sources: 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wxpxm7uq90wULrjsGvFmW-qJeMb2p2bUg8FaJa7fGqo/edit?usp=share_link

title: The Kid Who Hacked Twitter
